title: shap.dependence_plot doesn't work with sparse matrix
body:
Hi I guess dependence_plot method still doesn't support csr sparse matrix.
Here is what the error I get when I run
shap.dependence_plot(493, shap_values, X) where X is a csr matrix.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)

----> 2 shap.dependence_plot(493, shap_values, test_data[0][test.index.tolist()])
